title: Neighbors - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Introverted Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Past Trauma   Quiet Characters   Short Story
author: Qing Duan   青端
description:
The highly socially anxious Lin Wen welcomed a new neighbor.

One day, he ran into his unconscious new neighbor at the door.

…He’s quite good-looking, he picked him back up.>
